title: iPhone 9
description: An apple mobile which is nothing like apple, Hexa Core (2.65 GHz, Dual core, Lightning + 1.8 GHz, Quad core, Thunder)

title: iPhone X
description: The iPhone X display has rounded corners that follow a beautiful curved design, and these corners are within a standard rectangle. When measured as a standard rectangular shape, the screen is 5.85 inches diagonally (actual viewable area is less).With new features and capabilities that let you get more done quickly and easily, iOS 11 makes iPhone more powerful, personal, and intelligent than ever.

title: Samsung Universe 9
description: Samsung's new variant which goes beyond Galaxy to the Universe.

title: OPPOF19
description: OPPO F19 is officially announced on April 2021. Dont let a low battery dampen your prospects when life is calling. When you do need a boost. Saving you from the anxiety of overcharging, OPPO F19 with AI Night Charge adapts to your sleep habits and continues charging to 100% just before you wake up.

title: Inspiron 14
description: 12th Gen Intel® Core™ i3-1215U (10 MB cache, 6 cores, 8 threads, up to 4.40 GHz Turbo) has operating system Windows 11 Home Single Language, English 2 USB 3.2 Gen 2x1 Type-C with PowerDelivery and Video ,1 USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type A port,1 headset (headphone and microphone combo) port,1 HDMI 1.4 port

title: MacBook Pro
description: Testing conducted by Apple in May 2022 using pre-production 13-inch MacBook Pro systems with Apple M2, 8-core CPU, 10-core GPU, 8GB of RAM and 256GB SSD. The wireless web test measures battery life by wirelessly browsing 25 popular websites with display brightness set to 8 clicks from the bottom. Battery life varies by use and configuration.

title: Microsoft Surface Laptop
description: Style and speed. Stand out on HD video calls backed by Studio Mics. Capture ideas on the vibrant touchscreen. Microsoft Surface Laptop features a 7th generation Intel Core i5 processor, 256 GB of storage, 8 GB RAM, and up to 14.5 hours of video playback

title: Infinix INBOOK
description: Infinix Inbook X1 Ci3 10th 8GB 256GB 14 Win10 Grey 1 Year Warranty ,available in three vibrant colors, with backlit keyboard and hardware based provacy switch.

title: HP Pavilion 15
description: HP Pavilion 15 Laptop 10th Gen Core i5, 8GB, 256GB SSD, GTX 1650 4GB, Windows 10,HP Wide Vision 720p HD camera with temporal noise reduction and integrated dual array digital microphones ,Supports battery fast charge: approximately 50% in 45 minutes[5].

title: Mx Master 3s For Mac
description: Meet MX Master 3S for Mac – an iconic mouse remastered. Compatible with macOS, iPadOS1Device basic functions will be supported without software for operating systems other than Windows and macOS and seamlessly integrated into the Apple ecosystem for performance, with Mac-inspired colors, Quiet Clicks, and an 8K DPI track-on-glass sensor24 mm minimum glass thickness.
